message:
Dear {{ doc.custom___applicant_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that your interview with Excellent Minds has been scheduled. Below are the details of your interview:

Company Name: Excellent Minds Software Technologies India Pvt. Ltd.

Scheduled On: {{ doc.scheduled_on }}

Scheduled Time: {{ doc.from_time }} - {{ doc.to_time }}

Interview Type: Online

Google Meet Link: {{ doc.interview_link or 'https://meet.google.com/usn-tmxn-uzq' }}

Please ensure that you are available at the specified time and prepared for the interview. If you have any questions or need to reschedule, please contact us at careers@excellminds.com as soon as possible.

Please confirm your availability.

Best regards,

Project Manager
Excellent Minds Software Technologies India Pvt. Ltd.
Website - www.excellminds.com

message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

Thank you for applying for the {{doc.job_title}} position at Excellent Minds. We have received your application and appreciate your interest in joining our team.

We've received your application and will reach out if you're a good fit for the position.

Thank you again for your interest in Excellent Minds.

Best Regards,
Excellent Minds Software Technologies India Pvt Ltd
name: job application received mail to applicant

recipients.parent: job application received mail to applicant

subject: We received your application for {{ frappe.db.get_value("Job Opening", doc.job_title, "job_title") }}

message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to offer you the position of {{ doc.designation }} at Excellent Minds.

Below are the key details of your offer:

  • Designation: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Joining Date: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.joining_date) }}

Please confirm your decision by clicking one of the links below:

✅ Accept Offer    ❌ Reject Offer

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our HR team.

We look forward to your response.

Best regards,
HR Team
Excellent Minds
name: job offer accepted or rejected mail for applicant

recipients.parent: job offer accepted or rejected mail for applicant

subject: Job Offer for {{ doc.designation }} at Excellent Minds
